entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
